title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) for development and production.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and its CUDA runtime for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat and pull models.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Example repo showing how to build a RAG chatbot with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets a server chat with local Ollama models.
